Account
USD eur jpy gbp
GBP

Delivery is free for all orders over $70. Otherwise, delivery is $8.

Once your product has shipped, it usually takes 2 to 3 business days in France, 3 to 7 in Europe. 5 to 15 for the rest of the world. If you have not received your products, feel free to contact us using our contact page.

You can return your product up to 14 days after receiving your order. Please make sure that the products are not worn, washed or damaged.

Every single product we made is hand made

We are in daily contact with his son Gennaro to discuss the production and to talk about the development of new products.

More than a manufacturing workshop, they are genuine partners who believe in our project, our products and our vision of Leo and Violet since the first days of the brand.

Perfect experience

Thanks to the precious advice of the store owner, I choose this wonderful product. I absolutely love it! Additionally, my order was sent very quickly. I’m a happy customer and I’ll order again!

La Double Pochette Green

£169

Double leather pouch suitable for carrying your computer 13 inch and your accessories. Front compartment for your computer and back for your accessories. The double bag can be worn in the hand or on the shoulder with his strap in adjustable leather. Inner pocket with zip for storing your phone or your keys. Made in Italy.

About the shop

The story of Leo and Violette, it's ours. We are Léo Dominguez & Violette Polchi. Two Parisian lovers sharing our lives for more than 8 years. Since the early days of our meeting, we always had the dream to develop a project together. By creating Le petit cartable in January 2013, we started to realize this dream.
